text: I'm Richard Palmer from Hanwell in London. I support England and I think either Germany or France will win.
Hi, I'm really sorry to tell you that I don't watch any football. My name's Suzi O'Hara and I love tennis so I've got no idea who is going to win today.
My name's John Denison. I'm from Luton and I'll be supporting England at the Euros and I think England will win the tournament as well.
My name's Michael. I'm from Essex originally. I will be supporting England but Portugal I think I'd like to win
but if anybody's going to win it, probably Germany or Spain – probably Germany, I'd like Germany to win it…
